department: Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada
short_summary: Office furniture of the following classification: 56101700, is being purchased
full_summary:
### Office Furniture for Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada (ATSSC)

#### Tender Details

* ** Tender Reference Number **: `cb-4856-7476307`
* ** Solicitation Reference Number** : `20230054`
* ** Title: ** Office furniture for ATSSC (purchase, delivery, and installation)
* ** Tender Closing Date **: April 2nd, 2023, 2 pm (Eastern Time)
* ** Tender Description** : ATSSC is seeking quotations for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in Toronto, Ontario.

#### Vendor Information

* ** Contracting Entity: ** ATSSC (240 Sparks St, 4th Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0X8, Canada)
* ** Contact: ** Veronica Ross, Procurement Specialist (veronica.ross@tribunal.gc.ca), (343) 596-7267

#### Tender Requirements

* ** Goods Description: ** The contract covers the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture.
* ** Bidder Selection Criteria: ** Lowest Price
* ** Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to vendors who are participants in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* ** Contractual Obligations**:
    * Contract start date: May 1st, 2023
    * Contract end date: June 30th, 2023

#### Request for Information

* Interested bidders can access tender documentation through [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) 
    * English language tender documents: `[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4856/rfb-20230054---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4856/rfb-20230054---en.pdf)`
    * French language tender documents: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4856/ias-20230054---fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4856/ias-20230054---fr.pdf) 
* Tender documentation includes instructions for bid submission and evaluation criteria. 

All necessary official documentation is available online. We look forward to receiving responses from potential vendors. 
--- 
If you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out
